name: Evil Days of Luckless John
storyline: John, who has always had awful luck in every aspect of his life, finds himself one day heir of a successful casino from a distant relative. It seems that his luck has finally changed, but nothing further from reality: the Mafia is in charge of every casino in the area except for his, and now that his previous owner is dead, they are pushing to get hold of it. The game starts with John in jail, a consequence of the strings pulled by the Mafia itself.
summary: Evil Days of Luckless John is the English title of Žhavé léto 3 1/2 which was the last game in the Horké léto trilogy. It is a point and click adventure focused on crazy humor, however this time around there are other genres presented as well - racing, stealth, fighting and shoot ‘em up.
